title: SET_VEHICLE_ENVEFF_SCALE
content:
0x3AFDC536C3D016740x8332730C// SetVehicleEnveffScale
void SET_VEHICLE_ENVEFF_SCALE(Vehicle vehicle, float fade);Parameters:vehicle: Target vehiclefade: The paint fade effect strengthExamples with a besra:fade value 0.0fade value 0.5fade value 1.0The parameter fade is a value from 0-1, where 0 is fresh paint.Old name:  _SET_VEHICLE_PAINT_FADE
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleEnveffScale
void SET_VEHICLE_ENVEFF_SCALE(Vehicle vehicle, float fade);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_ENVEFF_SCALE
SetVehicleEnveffScale(vehicle, 0.0)
